title: Where Paradise Is Home
description: Secret Service Agent Ethan Burke begins his investigation into the disappearance of two federal agents.

title: Do Not Discuss Your Life Before
description: After discovering Bill Evans' corpse, Ethan teams up with Beverly to look for clues.

title: Our Town, Our Law
description: Kate's participation in a heinous act leaves Ethan stunned; Ben and Theresa continue their search.

title: One of Our Senior Realtors Has Chosen to Retire
description: The Burkes return to town to learn Ethan has been given a leadership role; Theresa gets a job offer.

title: The Truth
description: Ethan makes a shocking discovery outside of Wayward Pines; Theresa meets with her first client.

title: Choices
description: Ethan learns more about the eerie town's history and the people who live there.

title: Betrayal
description: Ethan is betrayed by one of his closest. Kate reveals a new truth.

title: The Friendliest Place on Earth
description: Ethan sets out to determine who is responsible for an explosion that left two in critical condition.

title: A Reckoning
description: Ethan interrogates Harold about other insurgents; Amy's health declines.

title: Cycle
description: Citizens of Wayward Pines react to the truth.

title: Enemy Lines
description: Theo awakens from suspension; The residents of Wayward Pines battle against the iron-fisted rule of the First Generation.

title: Blood Harvest
description: Theo learns the truth and his purpose for being in Wayward Pines; CJ spearheads a vital and potentially deadly project outside the fence.

title: Once Upon a Time in Wayward Pines
description: Nurse Pam resurfaces as a lethal threat to the town; Jason's past becomes known.

title: Exit Strategy
description: Xander returns to Wayward Pines with an unexpected guest; CJ leads a brave group on an expedition beyond the fence.

title: Sound the Alarm
description: The creation of Wayward Pines is revealed; Megan experiments on the first female Abby; Frank deals with personal struggles.

title: City Upon a Hill
description: The town's food supply is critically low after the Abbies attack CJ and the harvesters; Theo is able to build a makeshift triage unit.

title: Time Will Tell
description: CJ reflects on his life and the great responsibilities he's had over the centuries; Theo and Megan disagree over the Abbies' intelligence.

title: Pass Judgment
description: Theo enlists the help of Hassler to capture Margaret; Xander has a confrontation with Rebecca about her condition.

title: Walcott Prep
description: Pilcher recalls finding his Chosen One; Jason makes a fatal judgment call; Theo and Xander must put aside their differences to stop him before the human race is lost.

title: Bedtime Story
description: Theo is forced to make a decision that could seal humanity's fate.
